alert.note: Alert for Greene; Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 7:55AM EST until December 18 at 11:39PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schoharie Creek at Prattsville. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Major flood stage. Water overflows onto County Route 7 north of Route 23. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 13.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schoharie Creek Prattsville Flood Stage: 12.0 Observed Stage at Mon 7 am: 13.8 Forecast: Mon 1 pm 15.1 Mon 7 pm 11.1 Tue 1 am 8.9 Tue 7 am 7.7 Tue 1 pm 7.0 Tue 7 pm 6.5 Wed 1 am 6.2 Wed 7 am 5.9 Wed 1 pm 5.7 Wed 7 pm 5.5 Thu 1 am 5.4 &&
